short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a case-insensitive searchbox that filters the available recipients list in WebMail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a text entry field above the list of available recipients when selecting who to send a new WebMail to in Pearson OBL's Connexus. Typing into the text entry field filters the list of available recipients as you type. The filter is designed to be non-case-sensitive to make searching easier.
